EscapePipe
PipesTranslator
Pipe that performs translations between special characters and their XML equivalents.

When direction=cdata2text, all CDATA nodes are converted to text nodes without any other translations.

See also
Github - EscapePipe Implementation Examples
Javadoc - org.frankframework.pipes.EscapePipe
Syntax
Copy
<EscapePipe name=""/>
Attributes
Required
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
name	text	-
The functional name of this pipe. It can be referenced by the path attribute of a PipeForward.
Optional
ATTRIBUTE NAME & DESCRIPTION	TYPE	DEFAULT
substringStart	text	-
Substring to start translation.
substringEnd	text	-
Substring to end translation.
direction	options	-
Available Options: ENCODE, DECODE, CDATA2TEXT
encodeSubstring	boolean	false
When set to true, special characters in substringstart and substringend are first translated to their XML equivalents.
